description:
hash: tweak the package docs
No semantic change.
I found the wording distracting in a couple of instances and was moved to improve it.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

https://codereview.appspot.com/10478048/diff/1/src/pkg/hash/hash.go
File src/pkg/hash/hash.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/10478048/diff/1/src/pkg/hash/hash.go#newcode13
src/pkg/hash/hash.go:13: // (It is declared here by embedding the io.Writer interface.)
We're now teaching people how Go works in the standard library API docs?

https://codereview.appspot.com/10478048/diff/1/src/pkg/hash/hash.go#newcode21
src/pkg/hash/hash.go:21: // Reset resets the Hash to its initial state, as if zero bytes have
I would just say:

// Reset resets the Hash to its initial state.

The whole "as if zero bytes have been written" sounds too close to "like calling Write(nil)".

https://codereview.appspot.com/10478048/diff/1/src/pkg/hash/hash.go
File src/pkg/hash/hash.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/10478048/diff/1/src/pkg/hash/hash.go#newcode13
src/pkg/hash/hash.go:13: // (It is declared here by embedding the io.Writer interface.)
On 2013/06/24 23:32:47, bradfitz wrote:
> We're now teaching people how Go works in the standard library API docs?

I find the standard format "Writes does this" followed by something not called Write to be jarring. I could rephrase or drop this, but it feels like pedantry overriding quality.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, bradfitz@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, bradfitz@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=f6de76ff41a3 ***

hash: tweak the package docs
No semantic change.
I found the wording distracting in a couple of instances and was moved to improve it.

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/10478048

subject: code review 10478048: hash: tweak the package docs
